articles.title: Take the guesswork out of meal-planning with 75% off Fooducate Pro
articles.description: Find out if your favorite food makes the grade.

articles.title: ECB’s Rehn Says Must Account for Risk of Slowing Inflation
articles.description: European Central Bank Governing Council Member Olli Rehn said the risk of inflation slowing shouldn’t be overlooked, Helsingin Sanomat reported.

articles.title: Cities and states are turning to AI to improve road safety
articles.description:
As America’s aging roads fall further behind on much-needed repairs, cities and states are turning to artificial intelligence to spot the worst hazards and decide which fixes should come first.
Hawaii officials, for example, are giving away 1,000 dashboard ca…
